auth.name: Name
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.checkEmailForReset: Check your email for a password reset link
auth.registerDescription: Fill in your information to get started
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already in use
auth.accountCreated: Your account has been created successfully

home.title: Competition, fun, and balance in your daily life
home.subtitle: You can easily find competitions and other amateur players in your proximity to play fun and competitive matches.

admin.noAthletesToApprove: No athletes to approve at this time
admin.athleteApprovedSuccess: The athlete has been approved successfully
admin.athleteRejectedSuccess: The athlete has been rejected successfully
admin.arrangeSeedingDescription: Arrange athletes and designate seeded players
admin.seedingInfoDescription: Seeded athletes are placed strategically in the bracket to prevent top competitors from meeting in early rounds.
admin.seedingSavedSuccess: The athlete seeding has been saved successfully
admin.generateAndViewBracket: Generate and view the tournament bracket
admin.bracketReadyDescription: The tournament bracket has been generated and is ready to use
admin.bracketNotGeneratedDescription: You need to generate the tournament bracket before starting the tournament
admin.drawingProcess: This will create the initial bracket using seeding preferences
admin.clickGenerateToCreate: Click the Generate Now button to create the tournament bracket
admin.recordScoresAdvancePlayers: Record scores and advance players to the next round
admin.enterScoresForBothPlayers: Please enter scores for both players
admin.sameNumberOfGames: Both players must have the same number of games
admin.resultSavedSuccess: The match result has been saved successfully
admin.completeEarlierRounds: Complete the matches in earlier rounds first
admin.reviewAndFinalizeResults: Review the final standings and finalize the tournament
admin.tournamentCompleteDescription: This tournament has been finalized and the results have been recorded
admin.finalizeDescription: Once finalized, the tournament will be marked as completed and the final rankings will be recorded
admin.tournamentFinalizedSuccess: The tournament has been finalized successfully

tournaments.registrationSuccess: You've successfully registered for this tournament.
tournaments.checkSchedule: You're already registered for this tournament. Check below for schedule and bracket information.
tournaments.maxCapacityReached: This tournament has reached its maximum capacity of participants.
tournaments.paymentViaPix: Payment via PIX upon registration approval
tournaments.bracketGeneratedWhenBegins: The bracket will be generated once the tournament begins
tournaments.bracketAvailableWhen: The tournament bracket will be available once all registrations are confirmed and the tournament begins. Check back on {date}.
tournaments.bracketVisualization: Bracket visualization will be displayed here
tournaments.scheduleAndResults: Schedule and results of all tournament matches
tournaments.matchesScheduledWhenBegins: Matches will be scheduled once the tournament begins
tournaments.participantsList: List of registered participants will be displayed here
tournaments.noParticipantsYet: No participants have registered for this tournament yet
tournaments.notAdmin: You are not authorized to manage this tournament
